articles.description: The Premier League agrees a new £6.7bn deal for its domestic television rights with Sky and TNT to show 270 live games a season.
articles.title: Premier League agrees record £6.7bn TV rights deal

articles.description: Scotland boss Pedro Martinez Losa says it is "totally inappropriate" to question his side's integrity before their Nations League game with England.
articles.title: 'Totally inappropriate' to question Scotland's integrity

articles.description: Sheffield United, beaten 5-0 defeat at Burnley on Saturday, are bottom of the Premier League with five points from 14 games.
articles.title: Sheff Utd set to sack manager Heckingbottom

articles.description: Boss Mikel Arteta wants goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale to stay at Arsenal despite losing his starting place to David Raya.
articles.title: Arteta wants keeper Ramsdale to stay at Arsenal

articles.description: The England and Wales Cricket Board (ECB) has introduced an independent regulator in response to damning independent report into the game.
articles.title: ECB introduces independent cricket regulator

articles.description: The event is in doubt after the state of Victoria withdrew from hosting duties over spiralling costs.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: Gold Coast mayor scraps bid for 2026 event

articles.description: The Football Association charges Manchester City after players surrounded referee Simon Hooper in Sunday's draw against Tottenham.
articles.title: Man City charged over players confronting referee

articles.description: England and Bristol prop Kyle Sinckler says more players may follow captain Owen Farrell's lead and take a break from international rugby.
articles.title: Players may follow Farrell by taking break - Sinckler

articles.description: Fiji international Api Ratuniyarawa admits attacking three different women in a Cardiff bar.
articles.title: Barbarians rugby player Api Ratuniyarawa admits sex attacks

articles.description: The International Ice Hockey Federation will make neck guards mandatory following the death of Nottingham Panthers' Adam Johnson.
articles.title: Neck guards to be mandatory in IIHF competitions
